dialogue.introduction: Is the microphone's volume good? Check, 1,2... Okay. NIce to meet you, I'm Kirishima.
dialogue.library_intro: Kirishima here. I won't lose to my sister ship Haruna's brains! As a domestically-produced fast battleship, I'll work hard! One of the Aegis ships of the modern JMSDF succeeds my name.
dialogue.secretary2: Now, give your orders quickly, commander.
dialogue.secretary3: You know, what's with your constant poking? Is it a new command?
dialogue.secretaryidle: Mic check. One, Two. One-Two One-Two, THREEE, FOOUURR! Oh my! ...Pardon me, admiral. I thought I'd do some checks while you were away...
dialogue.secretarymarried: As expected from the Commander's judgement
dialogue.wedding: According to my calculations, after the battle is over, the commander and I probably, possibly, maybe... No.. it's nothing!
dialogue.joining_a_fleet: Going on a sortie! Now then, how shall we move out?
dialogue.equipment1: With this upgrade, Kirishima's combat capabilities have been improved. My thanks.
dialogue.equipment2: These upgrades are beyond what I'd imagined! As expected from my commnader. Far beyond your profiles in the data.
dialogue.supply: With this upgrade, Kirishima's combat capabilities have been improved. My thanks.
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: Prepare for anything and you will need nothing, as they say.
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: Best timing to enter the dock. As expected!
dialogue.docking_complete: A ship has been fully repaired.
dialogue.ship_construction: There's a notification of a new ship.
dialogue.return_from_sortie: Operation success! The fleet's returning. Want to check the battle result?
dialogue.attack: Main gun, aim the enemy! Fire!
dialogue.night_battle: Speed and firepower... fufu, commencing night attack.
dialogue.night_attack: Distance, velocity, check! All cannons open fire!
dialogue.artillery_spotting: Distance, velocity, check! All cannons open fire!
dialogue.night_special_attack_modifier_cutin_at_n: Distance, velocity, check! All cannons open fire!
dialogue.support_expedition_team_arrival: Distance, velocity, check! All cannons open fire!
dialogue.mvp: I'll give my all to be called the brain of the fleet!
dialogue.moderately_damaged: How could this happen under my combat strategy?
dialogue.valentines_day_2015: Kirishima is not as sweet as those chocolates you know~? Aiming, done! All main cannons, volley!
dialogue.white_day_2015: You know... You don't have to worry about getting chocolate just for me... Yes, don't worry...
dialogue.second_anniversary_2015: Is the mic volume okay? Check, one-two... Alright. Congratulations on the second anniversary. From here onwards...eh? Too long?
dialogue.christmas_2015: Right, it's time for Christmas party. The most important thing to bring at the stage is a microphone. Of course, please do a check on the mic as well. Yes, it's important indeed. I'm counting on you.
dialogue.end_of_year_2015: Now then, let's get in the mood for December's spring cleaning! Broom, check! Dustpan, check! I will now proceed with the sweeping. Sweeping battle ready, go!
dialogue.new_year_2016: Commander, greetings to you in this new year! Thank you for taking care of us last year. Pleased to be of service this year as well to us Kongou-class fast battleships. Ah, You're doing the Omikuji? It's an ending blessing.
dialogue.setsubun_2016: Right, it's time for Setsubun! So who is the demon role for this year? Hmm... I see. Right. Firing factors , check! Beans loaded! Setsubun barrage, aim... Fire! Tch... a near miss. Reloading shells!

hourly.0000: Mic check, One-Two. Alrighty, 0000. A new day has begun.
hourly.0100: 0100. Time announcements... This is Kirishima's forte.
hourly.0200: 0200... Now... wha? The mic condition's all...
hourly.0300: 0300. For the mic to break this late at night... oh? Ah, it's working? Wait a minute! Is the sound even coming out?
hourly.0400: 0400. Commander, the mic is all fixed! ...Commander? Commander? You're... asleep?
hourly.0500: 0500. Let's head out today with high spirits! Ah, Commander... sorry, did I wake you?
hourly.0600: 0600. It's morning. This refreshing feeling, it's morning!
hourly.0700: 0700. Alrighty, Commander. Please give the orders!
hourly.0800: 0800. C-commander? Y-you're... going back to sleep?
hourly.0900: 0900. Commander? Commander! Please wake uuuup! Kirishima is worried!
hourly.1000: 1000. Up until now, the time announcements have been a bit of trouble. I unknowingly let it get to such a state!
hourly.1100: 1100. All shipgirls, don't make such a ruckus. Today's missions shall be performed in the afternoon!
hourly.1200: 1200. Lunchtime, huh... Leave the commander's break to me, Kirishima.
hourly.1300: 1300. Kirishima will have lunch by herself. Because this ... is also a mission.
hourly.1400: 1400. The Commander has awakened. Please leave the support to me, Kirishima.
hourly.1500: 1500. The 2nd, 3rd and 4th fleets, are all off on expeditions!
hourly.1600: 1600. There aren't any deficiencies in the docks and the construction decks? Check.
hourly.1700: 1700. Commander, the weeklies are also coming along. Just as expected!
hourly.1800: 1800... That girl, has weak electrical systems? Wouldn't it be good to give them a hard whack?
hourly.1900: 1900. Oh, sorry. Kirishima typically likes to consider the theoretical possibilities.
hourly.2000: 2000. As the Commander's support, Kirishima is perfectly ready anytime!
hourly.2100: 2100. Commander, erm... the critical part... I wasn't talking about my hairstyle!
hourly.2200: 2200. Commander! If you take my glasses, I can't fight!
